org.lantern.cookie
Class CookieUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.lantern.cookie.CookieUtils

public class CookieUtils
extends Object

Utilities related to browser-like cookie logic mostly derived from RFC 6265

Constructor Detail

CookieUtils

public CookieUtils()
Method Detail

canBeSent

public static boolean canBeSent(StoredCookie cookie,
                                URI requestUri)
Returns:
true if and only if it is legitimate to send the StoredCookie given to the requestUri given according to RFC 6265 Section 5.4.1

domainMatches

public static boolean domainMatches(String cookieDomain,
                                    String hostname)
Parameters:
cookieDomain - canonical cookie domain
hostname - canonical hostname to path match against cookieDomain
Returns:
true if and only if the cookie Domain setting matches the given hostname according to RFC 6265 Section 5.1.3

canonicalizeHost

public static String canonicalizeHost(String host)
return a canonical form of the hostname given suitable for matching and domain matching in RFC6265 as described in Section 5.1.2

pathMatches

public static boolean pathMatches(String cookiePath,
                                  String requestPath)
Returns:
true if and only if the Path setting of the given cookie matches the given request path according to RFC 6265 Section 5.1.4

isPublicSuffix

public static boolean isPublicSuffix(String domain)
Returns:
true if and only if the domain given consititues a "public suffix" such as .com .co.uk etc.
See Also:
http://publicsuffix.org

normalizedSetCookieDomain

public static String normalizedSetCookieDomain(String domain)

normalizedSetCookiePath

public static String normalizedSetCookiePath(String path,
                                             URI originUri)

defaultSetCookiePath

public static String defaultSetCookiePath(URI requestUri)
Compute the default Path for a cookie sent from the given originUri according to RFC 6265 Section 5.1.4

makeSafeURI

public static URI makeSafeURI(String uri)
                       throws URISyntaxException
create a URI that may be a URL with unicode in the hostname. If so, first convert the hostname to A-Labels via RFC 3490. Works around an issue with constructing URIs with urls containing unicode hostnames.

Throws:
URISyntaxException

copyHttpRequestInfo

public static org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest copyHttpRequestInfo(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest toCopy)
Returns:
a new HttpRequest with the same basic info as the given request. includes version, method uri and headers. *This does not copy content*

dummyCookieFilterFactory

public static CookieFilter.Factory dummyCookieFilterFactory(CookieFilter f)
creates a cookie filter factory that always returns the same object.
